content.query:
CREATE USER [Rebrickable-Dev-Databricks] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER;
GO
EXEC sp_addrolemember db_owner, [Rebrickable-Dev-Databricks];
GRANT ADMINISTER DATABASE BULK OPERATIONS TO [Rebrickable-Dev-Databricks]

GRANT CREATE TABLE TO [Rebrickable-Dev-Databricks]
GRANT ALTER ON SCHEMA ::dbo TO [Rebrickable-Dev-Databricks]

CREATE TABLE OwnedSets
(
    set_num VARCHAR(255),
    Profile_ID INT,
    Date DATE,
    Price DECIMAL(10,2)
)
